title: test_authentication_and_authorization_endpoints
description: Verify the functionality of authentication endpoints including user registration, login, token refresh, and profile retrieval with role-based access control enforcement.

title: test_patient_management_endpoints
description: Validate patient management endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting patient records ensuring data integrity and access control.

title: test_appointment_scheduling_endpoints
description: Test appointment scheduling endpoints for booking, updating, retrieving appointments, checking calendar views, and availability to ensure correct scheduling logic.

title: test_billing_and_invoicing_endpoints
description: Verify billing endpoints for invoice generation, payment processing, invoice statistics, and revenue reporting for accuracy and security.

title: test_staff_management_endpoints
description: Validate staff management endpoints for managing hospital staff details, shifts, and schedules with proper role permissions.

title: test_laboratory_endpoints
description: Test laboratory endpoints for ordering lab tests, updating test results, and retrieving orders to ensure correct lab workflow.

title: test_pharmacy_endpoints
description: Verify pharmacy endpoints for managing prescription orders and inventory to ensure accurate pharmacy operations.

title: test_communications_endpoints
description: Test internal messaging and notification endpoints for sending, receiving messages, and retrieving notifications with correct user access.

title: test_rbac_system_endpoints
description: Validate role-based access control endpoints for managing roles, permissions, and assigning permissions to roles ensuring security compliance.
